metadata.Title: CVE-2020-8252 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium.
metadata.Description:
The implementation of realpath in libuv < 10.22.1, < 12.18.4, and < 14.9.0 used within Node.js incorrectly determined the buffer size which can result in a buffer overflow if the resolved path is longer than 256 bytes.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-8252` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libuv1 - 1.34.2-1ubuntu1.1
No subscription required

notes.Note: sbeattie> nodejs uses system libuv1 library mdeslaur> introduced in 1.24.0

criterions.comment: libuv1 package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.34.2-1ubuntu1.1').
